Tutorial1.Title: Welcome to Device Inspector<123>
Tutorial1.Message: See advanced information on your device.<123>

Tutorial2.Title: Modes<123>
Tutorial2.Message:
Device inspector has 4 views:

Events - view a real-time searchable list of published events.

Functions - interact with your device's functions.

Variables - interact with your device's variables.

Tinker - control pin behavior for your device<123>

Tutorial3.Title: Additional actions<123>
Tutorial3.Message: Tap the Control Panel button to access advanced actions.<123>
